title: Narita / Tokyo
content:
The flight from Gold Coast to Narita was mostly good, with just a few bits of turbulence during take off and landing through clouds.

Had dinner in the airport from ‚ÄúOne Bowl.‚Äù I had a beef on rice dish which was a nice tasty choice for my first meal in the country.

After that I had to catch 3 trains (all of different kinds) to reach the station where I met the friend I‚Äôm staying with in Tokyo. He was impressed I managed to make it to their local station on my own üòÄ.

Not too much time for talking by the time we got to their house, as it was a work night, and I was ready to sleep!
